description.narrative: The aim of the project is to analyze and understand the stories from the late 80s by a group of young people sons and daughters of the disappeared in the context of psychosocial care received by the Foundation PIDEE and relate to their current stories in o rder to link them in terms of experiences of political repression and the evolution of each of the stories. The synthesis of this collective memory will be given to the Museo de la Memoria as a contribution to the oral file of the museum.The aim is to make visible the harm in a child youth at the detention and disappearance of the parent. Share these individual stories and how they marked their development on a social and emotional level and finally analyze and contribute to the discussion of collective mem ory respect and promotion of human rights.
